Message.Title: Has KO reached hit highest level ever; at $40. in sep 2012?
Message.Msg: I have a long time calloption (C 45) but i doubt to hold it. It looks like the $40,00 was and will be the highest price ever for Coke. Thing have gone very good for Coke last 2 years but things cannot be very excellent for long time. Anyone a meaning about Ko here? What do you forecast?

Topic.Title: Things go better with Coca Cola
